concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 人名：比尔

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a surname or given name, originating from English and French linguistic roots, often associated with geographical locations or occupational designations in historical contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作姓氏或名字，源自英语和法语语言根源，在历史语境中常与地理地点或职业称谓相关。
definitions.example_en: John Beale was a prominent historian in 19th-century England.
definitions.example_cn: 约翰·比尔是19世纪英国一位著名的历史学家。
